messages: Ah..makes me wanna cry.. Makes me think of the moments I gotta cherish with my mom no matter how much we fight !
Ah..makes me wanna cry.. Makes me think of the moments I gotta cherish with my mom no matter how much we fight !
I'm mad cause we gonna have to make up all these snowdays at the end of the year
